# Code of Conduct

## Proprietary Software Notice

This software is proprietary and confidential. Access is restricted to authorized users only.

## Access Policy

- This codebase is private and exclusively available to users assigned by **STL Product Lab LLC**.
- Unauthorized access, distribution, or use of this software is strictly prohibited.
- All contributors must be explicitly authorized by STL Product Lab LLC.

## Authorized User Guidelines

Authorized users are expected to:

- Maintain confidentiality of the codebase and all related materials.
- Not share access credentials or repository access with unauthorized individuals.
- Report any security concerns or unauthorized access attempts to STL Product Lab LLC immediately.
- Follow all company policies regarding software development and data handling.

## Conduct Standards

Authorized contributors must:

- Maintain professional and respectful communication.
- Ensure all contributions meet quality and security standards.
- Protect proprietary information and trade secrets.
- Comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

## Enforcement

Violations of this Code of Conduct may result in:

- Immediate revocation of repository access.
- Termination of authorization status.
- Legal action as deemed appropriate by STL Product Lab LLC.

## Contact

For questions regarding access or authorization, contact STL Product Lab LLC.
